search.name: Alarm
search.description:
Schedule an alarm to go off at a certain time. The alarm message is optional. (All times are in Military (24hr) Time. Supports only a single alarm.)
Usage:
Set Alarm - alarm <time> [<message>]
Cancel Alarm - alarm cancel
Example:
alarm 14:00 Staff Meeting
